pullrequest.title: fix for issue #22, reducing inertia across fixed joints

content.raw:
I made some changes in [branch issue_22_scpeters](#!/osrf/sdformat/compare/issue_22_scpeters..issue_22_fixed_joint_inertia_reduction#diff) that you may consider merging into this pull request.

* I noticed some style issues in your test, but they weren't appearing in code_check. So I modified the code_check script to check the test folders. I then fixed all the style errors.
* I was seeing compilation warnings for using `EXPECT_EQ` with floating point values. So I changed to use `EXPECT_NEAR`.
* I also refactored the test substantially, introducing some data structures to simplify the test loop.
content.html:
I made some changes in branch issue_22_scpeters that you may consider merging into this pull request.

  • I noticed some style issues in your test, but they weren't appearing in code_check. So I modified the code_check script to check the test folders. I then fixed all the style errors.
  • I was seeing compilation warnings for using EXPECT_EQ with floating point values. So I changed to use EXPECT_NEAR.
  • I also refactored the test substantially, introducing some data structures to simplify the test loop.
